description:
After seeing Hikaru`s excellent affinity for baseball during the practice match, Daigo is depressed that they so far apart. Hikaru encourages Daigo and appeals to his love for baseball, and invites him to the Dolphins` practice. On the weekend, Hikaru and Daigo get together in the morning at the river bank to play catch. From afar, the Dolphins` star player Urabe and his catcher Andy are watching...
Source: crunchyroll
